altTitles.zh-ro: Yao Jing Zhong Zhi Shou Ce

description.en: Yuan Ding, an otaku, was transported to another world. After taking Shuo Yue Academy's entrance exam, Yuan Ding's life in another world begins, aiming to collect the Demon Spirits said to exist in the legends. A lighthearted, comedy and harem manhua.
description.pt: "Tantos espíritos demoníacos, quero capturá-los." Long Ao Tian. Yuan Ding, sai em uma viagem para capturar espíritos demoníacos.
description.ru: Юань Дин (园丁) – 16-летний отаку, который был перемещен в параллельный мир. Жизнь главного героя в другом мире началась со сдачи вступительных экзаменов в Академию Шо Юэ. А затем у него появилась цель – собрать все семена фей, о которых говорится в легендах.

title.en: Ofu-kai Shitara Tondemonai Yatsu ga Kita Hanashi

altTitles.ja: オフ会したらとんでもないやつが来た話

altTitles.en: A Story About an Offline Meet-up Between an Otaku and a Yakuza

description.en:
Miki Megumi is a loner and a closet otaku who's pretty devoted to her fan activities! She wants a friend who she can gush over her bias with... And when she went for an offline meeting with a follower from social media, they turned out to be a bona fide yakuza!!! Despite feeling like her life is in danger, after talking with him, she could tell that he's a truly passionate otaku!

He's overly sensitive, and any talk about shipping the reverse of his faves are a taboo. Plus, he turned out to be the troublemaker that his appearance suggests but being with him is fun and he's also dependable!!
description.ja: 三木めぐみはボッチでオタク活動に勤しむ隠れオタ! 推しについて語り合える友達が欲しい...と、SNSのフォロワーとオフ会をしてみたら、やってきたのはゴリゴリのヤクザ!!! 命の危険を感じつつも話をしてみると、やっぱり熱心なオタクだった! 繊細すぎるし逆カプが地雷だったりと見た目通りかなりの厄介者だけど、一緒にいると楽しいし頼もしい!!

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure.

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.

altTitles.ja: エデンズ ゼロ

description.en:
Shiki is a human who lives in a city filled with only robots. He considers the robots to be his best friends, and always takes care of them. Then, one day, he comes across another human - Rebecca, a girl who makes videos online to become popular. And at the same time, the robots start to go crazy?   
   
A new manga from Hiro Mashima, of [*Rave Master*](<https://mangadex.org/manga/1036>) and [*Fairy Tail*](<https://mangadex.org/manga/558>) fame.
description.ru: Она явит читателям абсолютно новую форму фэнтези. Там будет куча довольно-таки вызывающих шуток. Никакой связи с Хвостом новинка иметь не будет. В ней появится Плу из манги Rave Master.
description.tr:
İnsanların terk ettiği bir tema parkı olan Granbell Krallığı'nda artık robotlar yaşamaktadır. Robotların yanı sıra onlarla birlikte yaşamını sürdüren tek bir insan vardır: Shiki. Ömrünü sürekli bu makinelerle beraber yaşasa da günün birinde Rebecca ve kedisi Happy, bu tema parkına gelirler. Yeni ziyaretçilerin bilmediği ise Granbell'in yüzyıllar içerisindeki ilk konukları olduklarıydı. Shiki yeni arkadaşlar edinme yolunda tökezlerken robotlar bir ayaklanma başlatırlar. Doğup büyüdüğü yer artık çok tehlikeli bir hâle gelince Shiki, Rebecca ve Happy'nin uzay gemisine katılır ve uçsuz buçaksız bir uzay macerası başlar.

 [**Rave Master**](https://mangadex.org/title/5923081c-ad82-4a8b-a509-89ebe752db01) ve [**Fairy Tail**](https://mangadex.org/title/227e3f72-863f-46f9-bafe-c43104ca29ee) ile tanınan Hiro Mashima'nın yeni serisi.

description.en:
Set at a shop called The Amber Tea-house, this is a very heartwarming story that focuses on Seriho, the proprietress of the tea house, and Sarasa, the high school student who works there part-time. It'll set your heart aflutter!  
  
Volume 2 also includes Chapters 1-4 of Otomeiro Stay Tune as extras.  
  
A prologue can be found in Eternal Sisters.

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ライジングサン

description.en: Rising Sun will revolve around Tsubasa as he aims to participate in the Olympics as a representative from Japan.

altTitles.ja: からかい上手(?)の西片さん

altTitles.tl: Ang Magaling sa Panunuksong (?) si Nishikata-san

description.en: In this spinoff of "Teasing Master Takagi-san", and continuation of "Teasing Master (nee) Takagi-san", Chi Nishikata tries her hardest to tease her classmate Ooshiro, but for some reason it feels like she's met him somewhere. Can she finally get one over on him and remember her past?
description.tl: Si Chi, ang minamahal na anak ng (dating) Takagi at Nishikata. Ngayon ay nasa high school na kasama ang batang lalaki sa tabi, kaya ba n'yang tuksuhin s'ya tulad ng kanyang ina?! O s'ya ba ang matutukso tulad ng kanyang ama!? Ang mga araw na puno ng pang-aasar ay magsisimula na muli— !
description.uk: Це спін-офф манг "Майстер дражнилок Такаґі-сан" та "Майстер дражнилок(колишня) Такаґі-сан". Донька головних героїв Чі іде до школи і зустрічає друга дитинства. Як складуться їх відносини і чи зможе вона подражнити хлопця?
description.pt-br: Neste spin-off de "Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san" e continuação de "Karakai Jouzu no (Moto) Takagi-san", Nishikata Chi se esforça ao máximo para provocar seu colega de classe Ooshiro, mas por algum motivo parece que ela o conhece de algum lugar. Ela pode finalmente superá-lo e lembrar de seu passado?

In ancient China a young fighter named Chinmi goes to the Dairin temple for advanced training. He eventually must leave Dairin temple to go on a pilgrimage where he meets many challenges to test his skills.

description.en: It's been one year since Rin moved to Tokyo for high school. He was told by the landlord of his apartment that he didn't have to pay rent if he takes care of the landlord's granddaughter, which he immediately accepted. However, that granddaughter, Mako, ended up being a 20 year old college student who is completely incapable of taking care of herself. Even so, it was love at first sight for Rin, and he's been taking care of her ever since.

title.en: The Demon King's Daughter Is Too Kind!!

altTitles.ja: 魔王の娘は優しすぎる!!

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou no Musume wa Yasashi Sugiru!!

altTitles.pt-br: A filha do Rei Demônio é muito gentil!!

description.en: The strongest Demon King, Ahriman, rules every part of the world. However, he had to stop his world conquest all of a sudden. What is the unexpected reason behind this…?
description.pt-br: O Rei Demônio mais forte, Ahriman, controla cada parte do mundo. Mas, ele precisou parar de conquistar inesperadamente. Qual será a razão inesperada…?

description.en:
A miserable life where even dreams of love were out of reach. 
The night I tried to end my life from the exhaustion of my joyless marriage, a special invitation arrived unexpectedly.

[ You are an existence that gleams like the jewels.
The Jewel Box, where existences who shine like you gather... 
Would you like to enter the Jewel Box? YES? or NO? ]

[ The Empire's Jewel Box ] is a luxurious party attended by only the most outstanding people. A place where they can meet a marriage partner solely based on "true love" while concealing their face and status.
"If you were granted the opportunity to become a shining Jewel, like those who were specially selected..."

My choice from that night changed everything.

altTitles.en: I Am The Top Ranker Newbie

altTitles.th: ผู้เล่นหน้าใหม่เลเวลแมกซ์

altTitles.ja: 俺だけレベルMAXなビギナー

description.de: Jin Hyuk ist Streamer und der einzige, der das Ende des Virtual-Reality-Spiels „Turm der Prüfungen“ erlebt hat. Da das Spiel jedoch immer mehr an Beliebtheit verliert, wird auch seine Streamer-Karriere immer hoffnungsloser. Doch eines Tages wird „Turm der Prüfungen" plötzlich zur Realität und die Welt steht vor dem Abgrund. Jin Hyuk, der sich im Spiel besser auskennt als jeder andere, wird zwangsläufig zur letzten Hoffnung der Menschheit!
description.en:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the game’s popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower. 

"It’s time to show everyone what a hardcore gamer can do!"

---

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/max-level-newbie/list?title_no=3457)
description.fr: Le jeu de réalité virtuelle "La Tour de l'Épreuve" est officiellement démodé et le streamer Jinhyuk est le seul à être resté jusqu'au bout pour terminer le jeu. Quand un jour "La Tour de l'Épreuve" devient réalité, Jinhyuk qui connaît les éléments du jeu mieux que personne aura forcément un grand avantage sur les autres !
description.id: Jinhyuk, satu-satunya pemain game [MENARA UJIAN] yang menyelesaikan sampai akhir meski popularitas game telah menurun. Hingga suatu hari [MENARA UJIAN] menjadi kenyataan, Jinhyuk harus menyelesaikannya dengan segala elemen yang ia ketahui tentang game ini!
description.ja: ゲーム実況ストリーマーとして活動している主人公・鈴木裕人（すずきひろと）。彼は、万人があきらめたクソゲー『試練の塔』を挑戦しクリアした唯一のプレイヤーであった。念願のエンディングを見ることができたものの、もう誰も興味をもたないこのゲームはサービス終了が確実視されていた…。11年もかけクソゲーをクリアした裕人はこれを機に現実と向き合い、ゲーム実況者としての生活を終わらせることを決心した—。が次の日、現実世界に異変が起きる。街中に突如現れた不吉な塔、そして人類に課される生死をかけた試練。それはまさに裕人が11年の月日を費やしクリアした『試練の塔』そのものであった。塔の攻略法を把握している裕人はその経験を活かし、誰よりも強い最強のビギナーとしてあらたな試練に挑む！
description.ko:
게임 너튜버로 활동 중인 주인공 진혁은 유일하게
[시련의 탑]의 엔딩을 봤지만, 게임의 인기가 하락하며
더 이상 게임 너튜버로서의 삶도 유지하기 힘들어진다.

엔딩을 보았기에 이대로 게임을 마무리하려는 진혁.
바로 그날, [시련의 탑]은 현실이 되었다.
게임의 모든 요소를 다 알고 있는 진혁은
누구보다 빠르게 모든 것을 차지한다!

"진짜 고인물이 뭔지 보여주지."
description.ru:
Главный герой Джин Хек – игрок и стример, единственный, кто прошёл до конца «Башню испытаний».
Когда он увидел концовку игры, захотел бросить её. Но в тот же день «Башня испытания» стала реальностью. И главному герою не осталось ничего, кроме как показать, на что способен тот, кто знает все нюансы игры.

«Я покажу вам, что такое настоящий задрот!»
description.th: "จินฮยอก" สตรีมเมอร์หนุ่ม ผู้หลงใหลในการเล่นเกม ใช้เวลากว่า 11 ปี ในการบรรลุชั้นบนสุดของ '[หอคอยแห่งความทรหด] เกมแฟนตาซีเสมือนจริง' พอบรรลุเป้าหมายแล้ว จึงเกิดความคิดที่อยากจะล้มเลิกการเล่นเกม และการทำสตรีมมิ่ง แต่จู่ๆ วันหนึ่งเขาก็ตื่นมาพบว่า [หอคอยแห่งความทรหด] โผล่ขึ้นมาในชีวิตจริงซะอย่างนั้น!?
description.zh:
当游戏变为现实！
无名主播竟是唯一通关者！
男主镇赫是一名游戏主播，也是唯一一位“试炼之塔”游戏的通关玩家。随着“试炼之塔”这款游戏的热度下降，游戏主播的工作渐渐无法维持镇赫的生活。通关后的镇赫本想就此退游，然而游戏竟成为了现实。如果失败世界就会灭亡！对游戏了如指掌的镇赫还能在现实世界中通关吗？
description.zh-hk: 活躍於遊戲NewTube頻道的主角——振赫，他是唯一看過[試煉之塔]的結局，因為該款遊戲的人氣大跌，要經營NewTube頻道再也難以維持生計。 看完遊戲的結局後，原本振赫預計要結束不再玩遊戲。但就在當天，[試煉之塔]竟成為了現實。了解遊戲所有關卡的振赫，比誰都還要快占據所有物品。 「讓你見識什麼是真正的開掛高手。」

altTitles.de: Fantasie Geschichte eines Söldners in Armut

altTitles.th: เรื่องราวการผจญภัยสุดประหลาดของนายทหารถังแตก

description.en: After the soldiers’ mercenary group where he used to work had been utterly destroyed, Loren, who survived the disaster, decided to walk the adventurer’s path as a way to make a living. However, for Loren who had no acquaintances and empty pockets, receiving a single quest seemed like a faraway aim. So, as he was contemplating about what he should do next, another adventurer called out to him.---[Alternative RAW](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/5187)

altTitles.ja: モスクワ2160

description.en:
A future where the cold war between the USA and Russia never ended and has been going on for two centuries. 
"Liquidator" Daniel Kuragin runs through Moscow alleyways for score-settling with a submachine gun in hand!  
The overwhelmingly popular web series from "Goblin Slayer" creator Kumo Kagyu has begun publication.
description.ru: Холодная война так и не закончилась, и мир совсем забыл о том, что такое правда, свобода и надежда. Среди промышляющих в советской Москве кибернетизированных бандитов затесался «уборщик» Данила Курагин с целёхоньким телом, действующий сам по себе.
description.pt-br: A história se passa em um mundo onde a Guerra Fria já se estendeu por mais de 2 séculos e a tecnologia evoluiu de forma a criar “sombras mecanizadas”, cujo os objetivos são trabalhar como limpadores em um mundo repleto de conspirações.

description.en: A close and dangerous cohabitation with the cult leader's son has begun! Chungah was swindled by her uncle who she trusted and her parents disappeared, saying they are chasing their missing uncle, and Chungah suddenly lives alone in an empty house. But it wasn't just Chungah's family that was scammed! The biggest cult in the autonomous district, "Millennium Adventist Church," was also deceived by her uncle. And "Yohan," the son of the cult leader came to Chung-ah's house. He's dragging his luggage in...! God, is this cohabitation gonna be okay?
description.uk: Інтимне та небезпечне співмешкання з сином лідера культу почалось! Чону обманув її дядько, якому вона довіряла і її батьки пропали, коли сказали, що шукатимуть його, і раптом Чона живе одна в пустому будинку. Але обманули не тільки сім‘ю Чони! Найбільший культ в автономному районі «тисячолітня адвентистська церква» була теж обдурена її дядьком. І «Йохан», син лідера культу, прийшов до Чони додому. Він заносить свої речі…! Боже, що ж буде з цим співжиттям?
description.pt-br: Uma vida próxima e perigosa do filho do líder de um culto começou! Chungah foi enganada por seu tio em quem confiava e seus pais desapareceram, dizendo que estavam perseguindo seu tio desaparecido, e Chungah de repente vive sozinha em uma casa vazia. Mas não foi só a família de Chungah que foi enganada! O maior culto do distrito autônomo, "Igreja Adventista do Milênio", também foi enganado por seu tio. E "Yohan", o filho do líder do culto, veio à casa de Chung-ah. Ele está arrastando sua mala para dentro...! Deus, será que esta coabitação vai ficar bem?

title.en: Nokori Ichinichi de Hametsu Flag Zenbu Heshiorimasu: Zamaa RTA Kiroku 24Hr

altTitles.en: With One Day Left I'll Break All the Destruction Flags: "Serves You Right!" RTA 24 Hour Record

altTitles.ja: 残り一日で破滅フラグ全部へし折ります: ざまぁRTA記録24Hr

altTitles.en: Only One Day Remaining to Break All My Destruction Flags: 24 Hour Just Deserts Speedrun

description.en:
Alexandra is the duchess of the Kingdom of Tarraconensis. It was only the day before the absolution event that she realized that she was the villainous daughter of an otome game! It's clear that she'll be denounced and her engagement will be broken tomorrow.
But I don't want to be condemned honestly! I'd rather show my eyes to the people who despised me! With only 24 hours left, Alexandra begins to make a breakthrough in her desperate situation.
description.id:
Alexandra adalah putri seorang duke dari Kerajaan Tarraconensis. 
Ketika dia telah sadar jika dia adalah seorang villaness dari sebuah otome game, waktu yang tersisa sebelum acara pembatalan pertunangan hanya tersisa satu hari saja!
Sudah dipastikan bahwa saat itu akan diumumkan pembatalan pertunangannya!
Tapi dia tidak ingin hanya menerima pembatalan itu! melainkan dia ingin melakukan perlawanan kepada orang-orang yang membencinya!
Hanya tersisa 24 jam saja, alexandra memulai langkahnya untuk bisa keluar dari situasi keputus-asaan ini.

altTitles.ja: 葬送のフリーレン

altTitles.th: คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren

altTitles.el: Φρίρεν: Πέρα από το Τέλος του Ταξιδιού

altTitles.de: Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

altTitles.ja: ブルーロック

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

altTitles.ja-ro: Buruu Rokku

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr: Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

description.en: Kim Sojun, a former high school teacher who lost everything playing the stock market and came face-to-face with cruel reality, stumbles upon a heap of gold coins during a school trip. However, the moment he touches a coin, he is cursed and transported to a murim world. He wants to live a lazy and cushy life with the gold he found, but the System won’t let him do it. Not to mention, there are other transmigrators from the modern era who came to this world earlier than him. Surrounded by martial artists and skeletons, the murim life of Kim Sojun begins!
description.fr: Kim Sojun, un ancien professeur de lycée qui a tout perdu en jouant à la bourse et s’est retrouvé face à la cruelle réalité, tombe sur un tas de pièces d’or lors d’un voyage scolaire. Cependant, dès qu’il touche une pièce, il est maudit et transporté dans le murim. Il veut vivre une vie de paresse et de confort avec l’or qu’il a trouvé, mais le système ne le laisse pas faire. De plus, d’autres transmigrateurs de l’ère moderne sont arrivés dans ce monde plus tôt que lui. Entouré d’artistes martiaux et de squelettes, la vie de Kim Sojun dans le murim commence !

altTitles.ja: -ボルト- Two Blue Vortex

description.en:
With everyone's memories having been altered, Boruto finds himself being hunted by his own village. After escaping with Sasuke, what future awaits Boruto...?

(Source: MangaPlus)

---

**Links:**
- [Viz - Alternative Official English](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/boruto-two-blue-vortex)
description.es:
La memoria colectiva de la gente ha cambiado, y ahora la Villa de la Hoja va detrás de la vida de Boruto. Pese a las adversidades, alguien ha estado esperando junto a Sasuke después de abandonar la Villa.

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.fr: Les « souvenirs » des gens ont changé et désormais, la vie de Boruto est menacée au village caché de Konoha. La situation est telle que Boruto quitte le village avec Sasuke sans savoir ce qui les attend…
description.id:
Sesuatu telah mengubah "memori" para warga. Boruto yang kini menjadi buron melarikan diri dari Konoha bersama Sasuke. Di tengah konflik itu, yang telah menanti keduanya adalah...

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.th:
"ความทรงจำ" ของผู้คนเปลี่ยนไป ทำให้โบรุโตะต้องตกอยู่ในฐานะที่โดนหมู่บ้านโคโนะฮะงาคุเระหมายชีวิต ท่ามกลางเคราะห์ร้ายที่ประสบ สิ่งที่รอคอยโบรุโตะซึ่งหนีออกจากหมู่บ้านไปพร้อมๆ กับซาสึเกะก็คือ...

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: As "memórias" das pessoas foram alteradas e Boruto está numa posição onde a Vila Oculta da Folha quer tomar a sua vida. Durante essa adversidade, o que Boruto aguardava quando deixou a vila com o Sasuke era...

altTitles.en: My Kouhai Can't Be This Cute

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Kōhai ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai
Ore no Kouhai ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai

altTitles.ja: 俺の後輩がこんなに可愛いわけがない

description.en: Ore No Kouhai ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai follows the experiences of Ruri Gokou and Kyousuke Kousaka, as they both begin to explore the feelings that they have for each other. Will they be able to acknowledge their feelings for each other, or will they reach a standstill in their pursuit of happiness?

title.en: I Asked For a Rental Girlfriend and the Girl I Like Showed Up

altTitles.ja: レンタル彼女頼んだら好きな子がきた

altTitles.ja-ro: Rental Kanojo Tanondara Suki na Ko ga Kita

description.en:
I was the hidden leader of a rebellion.

I took in and enslaved the blue knight, who because of me, would be executed.

As previously promised, I was about to give him the title of a duke.

“Don’t call me Knight, I’m not a knight. Please don’t even use honorifics with me. I’m not a noble.”

“I am simply Your Highness’ slave.”

Though he is a broken knight, with him, I must try and rebel once again.

title.en: Smoking Behind the Supermarket with You

altTitles.ja: スーパーの裏でヤニ吸うふたり

Behind the Supermarket, Smoking With You

Deux fumeurs à l'arrière de la supérette

description.en:
Sasaki, an overworked salaryman, goes through an average stressful day just for a single light at the end of the tunnel: Yamada, the always-cheerful clerk at his favorite convenience store. 

One day, Sasaki takes an extra amount of time at a company meeting, and by the time he gets to the convenience store Yamada has already clocked out. However, as he leaves, he notices a young woman with piercings smoking behind the store?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/261)
description.ru:
Сасаки, переутомлённый служащий, каждый раз проживает обычный напряжённый день ради единственного света в конце туннеля: Ямада, жизнерадостная продавщица в его любимом магазинчике.
В один день, Сасаки задержался на работе и когда он возвращался домой через магазинчик, смена Ямады давно закончилась. Однако, когда он вышел, то заметил молодую женщину с пирсингом курящую за магазином.
description.vi: Sasaki - một người đàn ông làm công ăn lương, vượt qua những ngày làm việc mệt nhoài nhờ có tia sáng nơi cuối đường hầm: Yamada - nhân viên bán hàng luôn vui tươi tại siêu thị tiện lợi yêu thích của anh. Một ngày nọ, Sasaki phải ở lại công ty đến muộn vì một cuộc họp nên khi đến cửa hàng, Yamada đã hết giờ làm việc. Tuy nhiên, khi sắp rời đi, anh để ý thấy một cô gái trẻ đeo những chiếc khuyên xỏ đang ngồi hút thuốc phía sau cửa hàng…
description.es-la: Sasaki, un asalariado con exceso de trabajo, pasa por un día estresante promedio solo por una sola luz al final del túnel: Yamada, la siempre alegre empleada de su tienda de conveniencia favorita. Un día, Sasaki se toma una cantidad extra de tiempo en una reunión de la empresa, y cuando llega a la tienda de conveniencia, Yamada ya se había marchado. Sin embargo, cuando se va, se da cuenta de que una mujer joven con piercings fuma detrás de la tienda......
description.pt-br:
Sasaki, um assalariado sobrecarregado, passa por um dia estressante comum apenas por uma única luz no fim do túnel: Yamada, o sempre alegre balconista de sua loja de conveniência favorita.

Um dia, Sasaki leva um tempo extra em uma reunião da empresa e, quando chega à loja de conveniência, Yamada já bateu o ponto. No entanto, ao sair, ele percebe uma jovem com piercings fumando atrás da loja. O que vai se desenrolar?

altTitles.ja-ro: Yoroizuka-san wo Baburasetai

altTitles.ja: 鎧塚さんをバブらせたい

description.en: Kurumi is a shy and easily embarrassed high school girl with a strong imagination. Her girlfriend is a cool, iron-faced office worker, Ms. Yoroizuka, who doesn't show much emotion. In order to get the older woman to indulge in her, Kurumi tries all sorts of things to spoil Ms. Yoroizuka, but...?

title.en: Katainaka no Ossan, Kensei ni Naru: Tada no Inaka no Kenjutsu Shihan Datta noni, Taisei shita Deshi-tachi ga Ore wo Hottekurenai Ken

altTitles.en: From Old Country Bumpkin to Master Swordsman: My Hotshot Disciples Are All Grown Up Now, and They Won’t Leave Me Alone

altTitles.ja: 片田舎のおっさん、剣聖になる～ただの田舎の剣術師範だったのに、大成した弟子たちが俺を放ってくれない件～

altTitles.zh-hk: 鄉下的大叔成為劍聖～只不過是鄉下的劍術老師，但功成名就的弟子們不放過我的事～

altTitles.ru: Мужчина средних лет из глубинки становится мастером меча. «Я был просто сельским учителем фехтования, но мои преуспевшие ученицы не захотели оставить меня в покое!»

description.en:
Beryl Gardinant, a self-proclaimed “humble old man,” is a sword instructor at his dojo in a rural, backwater village. In his younger years, he dreamed of glory as a master swordsman, but those days are long behind him. Out of the blue, he receives a visit from a famous former pupil who brings him world-shattering news—he’s been appointed as a special instructor for the knights of the Liberion Order! With his life now turned upside down, Beryl travels to the capital and reunites with some of his former students: elite knights, an ace wizard, and even an adventurer who’s attained the highest guild rank possible. But why do they all want his tutelage?! As far as he’s concerned, they clearly don’t need him anymore. Can Beryl live up to his new position? And will he ever get a moment’s peace away from his adoring students?!

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/from-old-country-bumpkin-to-master-swordsman-my-hotshot-disciples-are-all-grown-up-now-and-they-won-t-leave-me-alone)
description.ja: 「ベリル先生を騎士団付きの特別指南役として推薦しました」。片田舎の村で細々と剣術道場を営む男、ベリル・ガーデナント。そこへ若き王国騎士団長に昇り詰めたかつての教え子、アリューシアが訪れ騎士団付きの特別指南役として王都へ行く事に。大成した弟子達と再会し、盛り立てられるベリルの運命は?おっさん成り上がりファンタジーの決定版、コミカライズ!

altTitles.ja: モデルちゃんと地味マネさん

description.en: A cool model and a manager’s romantic comedy begins!

altTitles.ja: 先生とJK

description.en:
Nako is a high school girl who falls in love with her cool and mysterious private teacher.
She loves her teacher and wants to act on her love, but sometimes it doesn't work out...
This is a heart-warming slice of life manga about the daily life of a girl who is in love with her teacher and her mysterious teacher who may or may not be aware of the girl's feelings.

altTitles.ja: 飛野さんのバカ

description.en: Class president and overall good girl Koguma is concerned that her classmate Hino often skips classes by spending her time behind one of the school buildings. Koguma feels it's her duty to guide Hino down a better path, even if it means going along with Hino's unusual requests.
description.pt-br: A presidente da classe e boa garota em geral, Koguma, está preocupada com sua colega de classe, Hino, que muitas vezes mata aula, passando o tempo atrás de um dos prédios da escola. Koguma sente que é seu dever guiar Hino por um caminho melhor, mesmo que isso signifique concordar com os pedidos incomuns de Hino.

description.en:
"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.

title.en: My Sister's Best Friend, My Lover.

altTitles.ja: 姉の親友、私の恋人。
Ane no Shinyuu, Watashi no Koibito.

description.en: Sena is a novelist who has been dealing with romantic feelings for her sister, Yuuna. Upon learning that Yuuna is to be married, Yuuna's best friend and former lover Kiku asks Sena to be her lover...

altTitles.ja: 愛囚ラヴァ

description.en: In a world where people suddenly developed super-powers, those who used their abilities to do evil are held at Catastrophe Prison. Shu Ono, a guard at the prison, somehow fell in love with the strongest female prisoner Lava! A crazy love-comedy about the forbidden relationship between guard and prisoner!
description.es-la: Un mundo en el que las personas desarrollan repentinamente habilidades diferentes. Los que utilizan sus habilidades para hacer el mal son encarcelados en una prisión de catastrófica. Shu Ono, que trabaja allí como guardia, se enamora de algún modo de la prisionera más fuerte, ¡Lava!

altTitles.es-la: La canción de la larga marcha

description.en:
Chang An in the Tang Dynasty of China (618–907): The demon star is passing through the sky, calamity is about to befall the Tang Dynasty.  
  
Princess Yongning is forced to flee the castle after her family is killed. Because she is young, she is able to pass for a boy and becomes renowned as a great military strategist. On her journey, she makes trusted allies with her skills as well as fearsome enemies while aiming to protect the Tang Dynasty and exact revenge.  
  
  
On hiatus or potentially discontinued after chapter 61 due to an ongoing conflict between the author and publisher.  
  
 [Official Vietnamese Translation](https://bookbuy.vn/truyen-tranh/truong-ca-hanh-tap-1-p39909.html)

altTitles.ja: ちびさんデイト

description.en: On the crescent-shaped island of Nantucket lives Seiji, a young Japanese artist. This heartwarming story is about his daily life and interactions with the people there.

title.en: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma wo go Kibou desu

altTitles.ja: 勇者さまは報酬に人妻をご希望です

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma o go Kiboudesu

altTitles.en: The Hero Wants a Married Woman as a Reward

description.en:
The hero, Chloe, is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people.  And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women, so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.

**"If you want me to save the city, give me the most beautiful milf"**

 A unique erotic Fantasy story created by a hero!
description.id:
Pahlawan ini keji...!!  Pahlawan, Chloe, adalah pahlawan aneh yang menuntut hadiah saat menyelamatkan orang. Dan yang membuatnya berbeda adalah hadiahnya...Dia hanya senang dengan wanita yang sudah menikah, jadi dia menuntut Milf yang paling cantik di kota. 

"Jika kau ingin aku menyelamatkan kota, berikan aku milf yang paling cantik" 

Sebuah cerita unik fantasi erotis yang dibuat oleh pahlawan!
description.ja: この勇者、下劣ッ…！！勇者・クロエは人々を救う際に報酬を要求する、異質な勇者だった。そして彼が異質なのはその報酬であった…彼は人妻にしか興奮しない為、その町で一番美しい人妻を要求するのであった。「町を救ってほしければ、一番美しい人妻を寄越せ」異色の勇者がおりなすエロファンタジー！

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daiyonshou - Seiiki to Gouyoku no Majou

altTitles.es: Re:Zero - Empezar de cero en un mundo diferente - Arco 4: El santuario y la bruja de la avaricia

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 4: The Sanctuary and the Witch of Greed

altTitles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活 第四章 聖域と強欲の魔女

description.en: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...
description.es:
Decididos a liberar a Rem de un misterioso letargo, Subaru y Emilia emprenden un nuevo viaje hacia el Santuario en donde se enfrentarán a nuevos peligros que jamás imaginarían.

¡La esperada adaptación del arco 4 comienza aquí!
description.ru: После победы над белым китом и архиепископом греха лени Петельгейзе, Субару наконец воссоединяется с Эмилией. Однако они узнают шокирующие новости, что на Круш с Рем по пути в столицу снова напал культ ведьмы. Круш потеряла свою память, а все воспоминания о Рем у людей были стёрты. Вместе с жителями деревни Субару решает вернуться обратно, однако деревня оказалась пустой. Оставшиеся жители, которые под руководством Рам отправились в так называемое "Святилище", до сих пор не вернулись. Что же там произошло?..

description.en:
***A complete comicalization of the musical drama that shares the same worldview as NieR:Automata!***

In the distant future, the earth is invaded by aliens and their "machine life" weapons, and humanity flees to the moon. The humans develop android soldiers and organize a resistance army. A long battle ensued & the year is 11941. In order to break the stalemate in the war, a new type of female android decisive weapon, "YoRHa," was formed and descended to the front lines of the Earth. What is the future of the automatic infantry dolls that fight only to carry out their goal of.... retaking the earth for humanity? A complete comicalization of the musical drama that shares the same worldview as NieR:Automata, written and supervised by Yoko Taro! (MTL)
description.pt: Adaptação da peça teatral "YoRHa Ver.1.2" de Yoko Taro, esta é a história de andróides lutando para recuperar a Terra para a humanidade, e o futuro para esses andróides cujo único propósito é lutar.

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢転生おじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Reincarnated as a Villainess

description.en: After a traffic accident, 52-year-old civil servant Kenzaburou Tondabayashi awakens to find he's become Grace Auvergne, a duke's daughter, and more importantly the villainess of an otome game. Not wanting to get in the way of the happy endings of the young characters around him, Grace sets out to play the role of the villain, but whether it's due to Kenzaburou's memories of being an affectionate parent getting in the way or not being able to remember those pesky foreign names properly, it ends up being a lot harder than it looks…
description.id:
Setelah mengalami sebuah kecelakaan, seorang PNS berusia 52 tahun bernama kenzaburou tondabayashi tiba-tiba berada di tubuh seorang putri duke yang bernama grace auvergne, terlebih lagi, grace merupakan seorang villainess di sebuah game otome. Tidak ingin mengganggu happy ending anak-anak muda yang ada di dekatnya, grace memutuskan untuk menjalankan perannya sebagai seorang villainess, tapi mungkin karena ingatan kenzaburou yang dulunya merupakan seorang orang tua yang penuh kasih sayang atau karena tidak bisa mengingat nama-nama asing, akhirnya setiap grace ingin menjalankan peran villainessnya, grace selalu terganggu.
Sehingga dia merasa menjadi seorang villainess ternyata lebih sulit dari yang dia pikirkan...

description.en:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

description.en:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.

---
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (U.S. Only)

description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

description.en:
“After all, a man must have big breasts… … .”

The man's chest visible through the sunlight is very handsome... … .
for a moment. Who are you naked next to me?

"Emperor… … your majesty?"

Unbelievable.
Unintentionally at a masquerade ball
It seems like he spent the night catching a tyrant.

“How dare you take away the emperor’s virginity and leave?”

No, last night was an agreement!

“If you knocked me down on the bed, you will be responsible.”

yes?
The look in your eyes that silently urges me to answer... … .

“I will take responsibility for the book, Your Majesty.”

I curled my tail.
description.pt-br:
“Afinal, um homem deve ter um peito grande…”

O homem cujo peito estava exposto à luz do sol era muito bonito… Espere, quem é você ? Por que você está nu ao meu lado?

“Sua Majestade… o Imperador?”

Inacreditável. Parece que ela involuntariamente passou uma noite com um tirano no baile de máscaras.

“Como você ousa querer ir embora depois de tirar a virgindade do imperador?”

Não, ontem à noite, nós dois concordamos!

“Se você me derrubou na cama, você deveria assumir a responsabilidade.”

Eu fiz?

Olhando naqueles olhos que insistiam em esperar por uma resposta, eu……

“Eu-eu assumirei a responsabilidade, Vossa Majestade.”
